title: Simply Gluten Free Appetizers
description: In "Simply…Gluten Free Appetizers" author Carol Kicinski offers up 22 of her favorite appetizer recipes that are not just “good for gluten free” but just plain GOOD!Whether you have Celiac disease, gluten sensitivity or you just want to try a gluten free diet, these recipes are simple, delicious and perfect for casual dining or special occasions. And many recipes are not only gluten free but dairy free, nut free, and vegan.This isn’t just your average recipe book – Carol’s sense of humor shines throughout the book, making for an entertaining and friendly journey through gluten free cooking. Carol gives you tips to help make cooking easier and more convenient, especially for those busy days of hosting holiday parties or family gatherings."Simply…Gluten Free Appetizers" is the first in Carol’s series of gluten free e-books. But she is no newcomer to the gluten free writing world. She is the author of one of the most popular gluten free blogs, has published two print cookbooks and is the founder and editor-in-chief of "Simply Gluten Free Magazine."Whether you’re a novice or beginner, "Simply…Gluten Free Appetizers" offers something scrumptious for everyone.
author: Carol Kicinski
